benefits.title: Why Use Roleplay Training?
benefits.practiceDesc: Engage with AI characters that simulate real workplace scenarios
benefits.skillsDesc: Focus on specific communication and leadership challenges
benefits.safeDesc: Make mistakes and learn without real-world consequences
benefits.feedbackDesc: Get detailed analysis and personalized improvement suggestions

tips.title: Roleplay Tips
tips.authenticDesc: Respond naturally as you would in real situations
tips.timeDesc: Think through your responses before sending
tips.learnDesc: Review the AI analysis to improve your skills

progress.title: Your Progress

ai.assistantDesc: AI-powered improvements and quiz questions for your content
ai.question: Question
ai.tutorIntro: Hi! I'm your AI tutor for this class. I can help answer questions about the course material, explain concepts, and guide you through your learning journey. What would you like to know?
ai.askAnything: Ask me anything about this class...
